ShortDescription.Value: Randomizes color of public transport lines

Publish.LongDescription:
* Randomizes color of the public transport lines.
* Works on all public transport types
* Color is changed when you select appropriate line tool and after you finish Transport Line
* Dont like the color? You can still override it manually
* If you want to randomize color again, switch to building something else (like tracks or road) and then switch back
Publish.ChangeLog:
* Generate broader spectrum of colors
* Colors now should be more different from each other
* Change also initial color
* Change color after finishing Line
